events.message: We have received your application for the Senior Software Engineer role. Thank you for your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorised under Engineering based on your software development experience.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to you to guide you through the hiring process for the Software Engineer position.
We completed your initial screening, and we are impressed with your background in software engineering and relevant technologies.
Thank you for your prompt response and availability for the upcoming technical interview; this helps us keep the process moving quickly.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 2 PM UTC with one of our lead engineers.
You completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating excellent knowledge of software engineering principles.
An HR interview has been scheduled for May 23rd at 11 AM UTC to discuss your fit with our company culture.
The HR interview went very well, with positive feedback regarding your communication skills and alignment with our values.
We have sent you a formal job offer for the Senior Software Engineer position, including salary, benefits, and start date details.
We received your feedback and acceptance of our job offer; we are excited to welcome you to the engineering team.
You have formally accepted our offer to join as Senior Software Engineer, and we're looking forward to your onboarding.
Your onboarding process has begun, including system access setup and orientation to integrate you into the engineering department.
The hiring process for the Senior Software Engineer position is now closed successfully with your official start at the company.
